\u043a\u043e\u0434\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043a\u0435 UTF-8 with BOM**:\n\n```powershell\n###############################################\n# Security Audit Script for MediaMTX\n###############################################\n\n$ErrorActionPreference = \"SilentlyContinue\"\n\nfunction Write-Check { \n    param($Message, $Status)\n    $symbol = switch ($Status) {\n        \"OK\"   { \"[OK]\" }\n        \"WARN\" { \"[!!]\" }\n        \"FAIL\" { \"[XX]\" }\n    }\n    $color = switch ($Status) {\n        \"OK\"   { \"Green\" }\n        \"WARN\" { \"Yellow\" }\n        \"FAIL\" { \"Red\" }\n    }\n    Write-Host \"$symbol $Message\" -ForegroundColor $color\n}\n\nfunction Write-Section { \n    param($Title)\n    Write-Host \"`n========================================\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\n    Write-Host $Title -ForegroundColor Cyan\n    Write-Host \"========================================`n\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\n}\n\n$issues = 0\n$warnings = 0\n$passed = 0\n\nWrite-Host \"`n========================================\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\nWrite-Host \"  AUDIT BEZOPASNOSTI MediaMTX + OZON PVZ\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\nWrite-Host \"========================================`n\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\n\n###############################################\n# 1. FILES AND FOLDERS\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"1. Proverka faylov konfiguracii\"\n\n$configFile = \"C:\\mediamtx\\mediamtx.yml\"\n$exeFile = \"C:\\mediamtx\\mediamtx.exe\"\n$logFolder = \"C:\\mediamtx\\logs\"\n\nif (Test-Path $configFile) {\n    Write-Check \"Fayl konfiguracii nayden\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Fayl konfiguracii NE NAYDEN: $configFile\" \"FAIL\"\n    $issues++\n}\n\nif (Test-Path $exeFile) {\n    Write-Check \"Ispolnyaemyy fayl nayden\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Ispolnyaemyy fayl NE NAYDEN: $exeFile\" \"FAIL\"\n    $issues++\n}\n\nif (Test-Path $logFolder) {\n    Write-Check \"Papka logov naydena\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Papka logov NE NAYDENA: $logFolder\" \"WARN\"\n    $warnings++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 2. ACCESS RIGHTS\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"2. Proverka prav dostupa\"\n\nif (Test-Path $configFile) {\n    $acl = Get-Acl $configFile\n    $accessRules = $acl.Access\n    \n    $allowedIdentities = @(\"NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM\", \"BUILTIN\\Administratory\", \"BUILTIN\\Administrators\")\n    $unauthorizedAccess = $accessRules | Where-Object { \n        $_.IdentityReference.Value -notin $allowedIdentities -and \n        $_.AccessControlType -eq \"Allow\"\n    }\n    \n    if ($unauthorizedAccess) {\n        Write-Check \"Obnaruzhen nesankcionirovannyy dostup k konfiguracii\" \"FAIL\"\n        $unauthorizedAccess | ForEach-Object {\n            Write-Host \"  -> $($_.IdentityReference): $($_.FileSystemRights)\" -ForegroundColor Red\n        }\n        $issues++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Prava dostupa k konfiguracii nastroeny pravilno\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n    \n    if ($acl.AreAccessRulesProtected) {\n        Write-Check \"Nasledovanie prav otklyucheno\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Nasledovanie prav NE otklyucheno\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 3. PASSWORD ANALYSIS\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"3. Analiz paroley\"\n\nif (Test-Path $configFile) {\n    $config = Get-Content $configFile -Raw\n    \n    $weakPasswords = @(\"admin\", \"12345\", \"password\", \"123456\", \"admin123\")\n    $foundWeak = $false\n    \n    foreach ($weak in $weakPasswords) {\n        if ($config -match \"pass:\\s*[`\"']?$weak[`\"']?\") {\n            Write-Check \"Obnaruzhen SLABYY parol: $weak\" \"FAIL\"\n            $foundWeak = $true\n            $issues++\n        }\n    }\n    \n    if (-not $foundWeak) {\n        Write-Check \"Slabye paroli ne obnaruzheny\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n    \n    $passwords = [regex]::Matches($config, 'pass:\\s*[`\"'']([^`\"'']+)[`\"'']')\n    $shortPasswords = $passwords | Where-Object { $_.Groups[1].Value.Length -lt 12 }\n    \n    if ($shortPasswords.Count -gt 0) {\n        Write-Check \"Obnaruzheny korotkie paroli (< 12 simvolov)\" \"WARN\"\n        Write-Host \"  -> Naydeno paroley koroche 12 simvolov: $($shortPasswords.Count)\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n        $warnings++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Vse paroli imeyut dostatochnuyu dlinu (>=12 simvolov)\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n    \n    if ($config -match \"user:\\s*any\") {\n        Write-Check \"KRITICHNO: Obnaruzhen anonimnyy polzovatel 'any'\" \"FAIL\"\n        $issues++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Anonimnyy dostup otklyuchen\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 4. NETWORK SECURITY\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"4. Setevaya bezopasnost\"\n\n$rtspPort = netstat -an | Select-String \"LISTENING\" | Select-String \":47659\"\n\nif ($rtspPort) {\n    Write-Check \"MediaMTX slushaet na RTSP portu\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"MediaMTX NE slushaet na ozhidaemom portu\" \"FAIL\"\n    $issues++\n}\n\n$cameraPort = netstat -an | Select-String \"LISTENING\" | Select-String \":554\" | Select-String \"0.0.0.0\"\n\nif ($cameraPort) {\n    Write-Check \"PREDUPREZHDENIE: Port 554 (kamery) slushaet na 0.0.0.0\" \"WARN\"\n    Write-Host \"  -> Kamery mogut byt dostupny napryamuyu iz seti\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n    $warnings++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Port 554 (kamery) ne otkryt naruzhu\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 5. FIREWALL\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"5. Pravila Windows Firewall\"\n\n$mediamtxRules = Get-NetFirewallRule | Where-Object { \n    $_.DisplayName -like \"*MediaMTX*\" -and $_.Enabled -eq $true \n}\n\nif ($mediamtxRules) {\n    $allowRules = $mediamtxRules | Where-Object { $_.Action -eq \"Allow\" }\n    \n    if ($allowRules) {\n        Write-Check \"Naydeny razreshayushchie pravila Firewall dlya MediaMTX\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n    \n    $conflicts = Get-NetFirewallRule | Where-Object {\n        ($_.DisplayName -like \"*mediamtx.exe*\" -or $_.Program -like \"*mediamtx.exe*\") -and\n        $_.Action -eq \"Block\" -and\n        $_.Enabled -eq $true\n    }\n    \n    if ($conflicts) {\n        Write-Check \"Obnaruzheny KONFLIKTUYUSHCHIE blokiruyushchie pravila\" \"FAIL\"\n        $conflicts | ForEach-Object {\n            Write-Host \"  -> $($_.DisplayName)\" -ForegroundColor Red\n        }\n        $issues++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Konfliktuyushchikh pravil ne naydeno\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    }\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Pravila Firewall dlya MediaMTX ne naydeny\" \"WARN\"\n    $warnings++\n}\n\n$cameraBlockRule = Get-NetFirewallRule | Where-Object { \n    $_.DisplayName -like \"*Camera*\" -and \n    $_.Action -eq \"Block\" -and \n    $_.Enabled -eq $true\n}\n\nif ($cameraBlockRule) {\n    Write-Check \"Pryamoy dostup k kameram blokirovan Firewall\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Net pravila blokirovki pryamogo dostupa k kameram\" \"WARN\"\n    $warnings++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 6. SERVICE\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"6. Sluzhba Windows\"\n\n$service = Get-Service -Name \"MediaMTX\" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue\n\nif ($service) {\n    if ($service.Status -eq \"Running\") {\n        Write-Check \"Sluzhba MediaMTX zapushchena\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Sluzhba MediaMTX NE ZAPUSHCHENA\" \"FAIL\"\n        $issues++\n    }\n    \n    if ($service.StartType -eq \"Automatic\") {\n        Write-Check \"Avtozapusk sluzhby vklyuchen\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Avtozapusk sluzhby NE nastroen\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"Sluzhba MediaMTX ne ustanovlena (zapuskaetsya vruchnuyu?)\" \"WARN\"\n    $warnings++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 7. LOGS\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"7. Analiz logov\"\n\nif (Test-Path $logFolder) {\n    $logFile = Join-Path $logFolder \"mediamtx.log\"\n    \n    if (Test-Path $logFile) {\n        $logContent = Get-Content $logFile -Tail 100 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue\n        \n        $authErrors = $logContent | Select-String \"401\" | Measure-Object\n        if ($authErrors.Count -gt 5) {\n            Write-Check \"Obnaruzheno mnogo oshibok autentifikacii (401): $($authErrors.Count)\" \"WARN\"\n            Write-Host \"  -> Vozmozhna ataka brutforsa ili nepravilnye paroli kamer\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n            $warnings++\n        } else {\n            Write-Check \"Podozritelnykh oshibok autentifikacii ne obnaruzheno\" \"OK\"\n            $passed++\n        }\n        \n        $readyCameras = $logContent | Select-String \"ready:\" | Select-String \"cam\" | Measure-Object\n        if ($readyCameras.Count -ge 4) {\n            Write-Check \"Vse 4 kamery podklyucheny i rabotayut\" \"OK\"\n            $passed++\n        } else {\n            Write-Check \"Ne vse kamery podklyucheny (naydeno: $($readyCameras.Count) iz 4)\" \"WARN\"\n            $warnings++\n        }\n        \n        $criticalErrors = $logContent | Select-String \"ERR\" | Measure-Object\n        if ($criticalErrors.Count -gt 10) {\n            Write-Check \"Obnaruzheno mnogo oshibok v logakh: $($criticalErrors.Count)\" \"WARN\"\n            Write-Host \"  -> Poslednie oshibki:\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n            $logContent | Select-String \"ERR\" | Select-Object -Last 3 | ForEach-Object {\n                Write-Host \"    $_\" -ForegroundColor Gray\n            }\n            $warnings++\n        } else {\n            Write-Check \"Kriticheskikh oshibok v logakh malo\" \"OK\"\n            $passed++\n        }\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Fayl loga ne nayden\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 8. PERFORMANCE\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"8. Proizvoditelnost\"\n\nif ($service -and $service.Status -eq \"Running\") {\n    $process = Get-Process -Name \"mediamtx\" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue\n    \n    if ($process) {\n        $cpu = $process.CPU\n        $memory = [math]::Round($process.WorkingSet64 / 1MB, 2)\n        \n        Write-Host \"  Process MediaMTX:\" -ForegroundColor Gray\n        Write-Host \"    CPU: $cpu sek (obshchee vremya)\" -ForegroundColor Gray\n        Write-Host \"    RAM: $memory MB\" -ForegroundColor Gray\n        \n        if ($memory -lt 500) {\n            Write-Check \"Ispolzovanie pamyati v norme (< 500 MB)\" \"OK\"\n            $passed++\n        } else {\n            Write-Check \"Vysokoe ispolzovanie pamyati (> 500 MB)\" \"WARN\"\n            $warnings++\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 9. CONFIG SECURITY\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"9. Nastroyki bezopasnosti v konfiguracii\"\n\nif (Test-Path $configFile) {\n    $config = Get-Content $configFile -Raw\n    \n    if ($config -match \"rtspTransports:\\s*\\[tcp\\]\") {\n        Write-Check \"Ispolzuetsya tolko TCP (bezopasnee)\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"UDP mozhet byt vklyuchen (menee bezopasno)\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n    \n    $protocols = @(\"rtmp\", \"hls\", \"webrtc\", \"srt\")\n    $disabledCount = 0\n    \n    foreach ($proto in $protocols) {\n        $pattern = \"${proto}:\\s*no\"\n        if ($config -match $pattern) {\n            $disabledCount++\n        }\n    }\n    \n    if ($disabledCount -eq 4) {\n        Write-Check \"Vse nenuzhnye protokoly otklyucheny (RTMP, HLS, WebRTC, SRT)\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Nekotorye nenuzhnye protokoly vklyucheny\" \"WARN\"\n        Write-Host \"  -> Rekomenduetsya otklyuchit neispolzuemye protokoly\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n        $warnings++\n    }\n    \n    if ($config -match \"overridePublisher:\\s*no\") {\n        Write-Check \"Zashchita ot perezapisi publisher vklyuchena\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Perezapis publisher razreshena (risk DoS)\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n    \n    if ($config -match \"maxReaders:\\s*[0-9]+\") {\n        Write-Check \"Ogranichenie kolichestva chitateley nastroeno\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"Ogranichenie kolichestva chitateley ne nastroeno\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 10. BITLOCKER\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"10. Shifrovanie diska (BitLocker)\"\n\ntry {\n    $bitlocker = Get-BitLockerVolume -MountPoint \"C:\" -ErrorAction Stop\n    \n    if ($bitlocker.ProtectionStatus -eq \"On\") {\n        Write-Check \"BitLocker VKLYUCHEN na diske C:\\\" \"OK\"\n        $passed++\n    } else {\n        Write-Check \"BitLocker NE VKLYUCHEN (rekomenduetsya dlya zashchity dannykh)\" \"WARN\"\n        $warnings++\n    }\n} catch {\n    Write-Check \"BitLocker nedostupen ili ne nastroen\" \"WARN\"\n    $warnings++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 11. CONNECTION TEST\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"11. Test podklyucheniya k MediaMTX\"\n\n$testPort = 47659\n$testResult = Test-NetConnection -ComputerName \"127.0.0.1\" -Port $testPort -WarningAction SilentlyContinue\n\nif ($testResult.TcpTestSucceeded) {\n    Write-Check \"MediaMTX dostupen lokalno na portu $testPort\" \"OK\"\n    $passed++\n} else {\n    Write-Check \"MediaMTX NE DOSTUPEN na portu $testPort\" \"FAIL\"\n    $issues++\n}\n\n###############################################\n# 12. FINAL REPORT\n###############################################\nWrite-Section \"ITOGOVYY OTCHET\"\n\n$total = $passed + $warnings + $issues\n\nWrite-Host \"Vsego proverok: $total\" -ForegroundColor White\nWrite-Host \"[OK] Proydeno:     $passed\" -ForegroundColor Green\nWrite-Host \"[!!] Preduprezhdeny: $warnings\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\nWrite-Host \"[XX] Kriticheskikh problem: $issues\" -ForegroundColor Red\n\nWrite-Host \"\"\n\n$score = if ($total -gt 0) { [math]::Round(($passed / $total) * 100, 0) } else { 0 }\n\nif ($issues -eq 0 -and $warnings -eq 0) {\n    Write-Host \"OCENKA: OTLICHNO (100%)\" -ForegroundColor Green\n    Write-Host \"Sistema polnostyu zashchishchena!\" -ForegroundColor Green\n} elseif ($issues -eq 0 -and $warnings -le 3) {\n    Write-Host \"OCENKA: KHOROSHO ($score%)\" -ForegroundColor Green\n    Write-Host \"Sistema dostatochno zashchishchena, est nebolshie rekomendacii.\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n} elseif ($issues -le 2) {\n    Write-Host \"OCENKA: UDOVLETVORITELNO ($score%)\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n    Write-Host \"Obnaruzheny problemy bezopasnosti, trebuetsya vnimanie.\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n} else {\n    Write-Host \"OCENKA: NEBEZOPASNO ($score%)\" -ForegroundColor Red\n    Write-Host \"KRITICHNO: Obnaruzheny sereznye problemy bezopasnosti!\" -ForegroundColor Red\n}\n\nWrite-Host \"`n========================================`n\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\n\nif ($issues -gt 0 -or $warnings -gt 0) {\n    Write-Host \"REKOMENDACII PO ULUCHSHENIYU:\" -ForegroundColor Cyan\n    Write-Host \"\"\n    \n    if ($issues -gt 0) {\n        Write-Host \"Kriticheskie problemy trebuyut NEMEDLENNOGO ispravleniya!\" -ForegroundColor Red\n    }\n    \n    if ($warnings -gt 0) {\n        Write-Host \"Rekomenduetsya ustranit preduprezhdeniya dlya povysheniya bezopasnosti.\" -ForegroundColor Yellow\n    }\n    \n    Write-Host \"\"\n}\n\n$reportPath = \"C:\\mediamtx\\logs\\security_audit_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss').txt\"\nWrite-Host \"Otchet sokhranyon: $reportPath\" -ForegroundColor Gray\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83d\ude80 \u043c\n  \u041a\u0430\u043c\u0435\u0440\u0430 3: 10 \u043c \u00d7 1.2 = 12 \u043c\n  \u041a\u0430\u043c\u0435\u0440\u0430 4: 25 \u043c \u00d7 1.2 = 30 \u043c\n  \u0418\u0422\u041e\u0413\u041e: 84 \u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u044b\n\n**\u041d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u044b\u0435 \u00d7 10-20 \u0448\u0442\n  - \u0426\u0435\u043d\u0430: ~5-10\u20bd/\u0448\u0442\n  \n\u0418\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u044b:\n  - \u041e\u0431\u0436\u0438\u043c\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043b\u0435\u0449\u0438 (\u043a\u0440\u0438\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0440) ~500-1500\u20bd\n  - \u0421\u0442\u0440\u0438\u043f\u043f\u0435\u0440 (\u0434\u043b\u044f \u0437\u0430\u0447\u0438\u0441\u0442\u043a\u0438) ~300-500\u20bd\n  - \u041a\u0430\u0431\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0442\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440 ~500-1000\u20bd\n  - \u041e\u0442\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0442\u043a\u0438, \u043d\u043e\u0436\n\n\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0445\u043e\u0434\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0438:\n  - \u041a\u0430\u0431\u0435\u043b\u044c-\u043a\u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044b/\u0433\u043e\u0444\u0440\u0430\n  - \u0421\u0442\u044f\u0436\u043a\u0438 (\u0445\u043e\u043c\u0443\u0442\u044b)\n  - \u0414\u044e\u0431\u0435\u043b\u0438, \u0441\u0430\u043c\u043e\u0440\u0435\u0437\u044b\n```\n\n**\u0421\u0445\u0435\u043c\u0430 \u043e\u0431\u0436\u0438\u043c\u0430 T568B (\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0434\u0430\u0440\u0442):**\n```\nPin 1: \u0411\u0435\u043b\u043e-\u041e\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0436\u0435\u0432\u044b\u0439\nPin 2: \u0420\u0435\u0437\u0435\u0440\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u043f\u0438\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435 (\u0418\u0411\u041f)\n\n### \u0420\u0430\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0442 \u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443\u0435\u043c\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438\n\n**\u0424\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0443\u043b\u0430:**\n```\n\u041c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c \u0418\u0411\u041f (\u0412\u0410) = (\u0421\u0443\u043c\u043c\u0430_\u043c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439_\u0443\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u0439\u0441\u0442\u0432 / 0.6) \u00d7 1.3\n\n\u0413\u0434\u0435:\n  0.6 = \u043a\u043e\u044d\u0444\u0444\u0438\u0446\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u043c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 (Power Factor)\n  1.3 = \u0437\u0430\u043f\u0430\u0441 30%\n\n\u041f\u0440\u0438\u043c\u0435\u0440 \u0434\u043b\u044f \u041f\u0412\u0417:\n  MediaMTX \u0441\u0435\u0440\u0432\u0435\u0440: 50 \u0412\u0442\n  \u0420\u043e\u0443\u0442\u0435\u0440: 10 \u0418\u0411\u041f: (120 / 0.6) \u00d7 1.3 = 260 \u0412\u0410\n  \u0420\u0435\u043a\u043e\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0434\u0443\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f: 600-650 \u0412\u0410\n```\n\n**\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0442 \u0432\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0438 \u0430\u0432\u0442\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0438\u0438:**\n```\n\u0412\u0440\u0435\u043c\u044f (\u043c\u0438\u043d\u0443\u0442\u044b) = (\u0415\u043c\u043a\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c_\u0431\u0430\u0442\u0430\u0440\u0435\u0438_\u0410\u0447 \u00d7 \u041d\u0430\u043f\u0440\u044f\u0436\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435_\u0412 \u00d7 0.9) / \u041c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c_\u043d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0437\u043a\u0438_\u0412\u0442 \u00d7 60\n\n\u041f\u0440\u0438\u043c\u0435\u0440:\n  \u0418\u0411\u041f APC Back-UPS 650VA:\n    \u0415\u043c\u043a\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c: 12V \u00d7 7Ah = 84 \u0412\u0442\u0447\n
